content: this is a modification of another pattern on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/christmas-tree-hat--elfin-socks 1 for premies and newborns by patti pierce stone i have scaled it up to fit an adult head 10/31/08 - the pattern is still in draft please knit this pattern and let me know if you see any errors and how much yarn you used and what weight i will update the pattern when i feel it is bulletproof 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/christmas-tree-hat--elfin-socks
